Posts.Content: AnneinCT wrote: I am 44 years old and I’ve had A bloody discharge from one duct in my Left breast for the last month. I had a mammogram and ultrasound that showed nothing a Ductogram that they could not complete Because I fainted 3 Times and had a seizure. I had an MRI and just got the results and they found three “lesions“ in my left breast and two “lesions and “in my right breast. Report says MRI abnormal BIRADS3 follow up 3 months if no surgery for duct issue. None of the lesions show cause for bleeding.Has anyone had any experience with something like this? I have an appointment with breast surgeon Friday and she wants me to re attempt ductogram. I told her I want 5 biopsies not a follow up mri in 3 months. Any advice would be appreciated. Posts.Title: Bleeding from one duct AnneinCT AnneinCT

Posts.Content: Nov 8, 2017 12:00PM AnneinCT wrote: yes it’s clear what duct it is. That’s why she is pushing me to retry the ductogra. Wouldn’t a papilloma have shown on the Mri?
